name: Shipping Day
description:
Shipping Day is a sliding-tile puzzle game about a shipping company exporting boxes for delivery. As the game progresses, new objects are introduced and the puzzles increase in difficulty.

All of the game's controls are mouse only!

All art, programming, game design, and sound effects were made by me.

The music used is "Simple Fun" by HeatleyBros.

This is the second game that I've published on my itch.io page. If you enjoy my games, I highly encourage you to follow my itch.io page!

HOW TO PLAY:

If you are using a Windows device, use the download button below to download Shipping Day. Run the "ShippingDay.exe" file in the folder, unzipping the file is optional. All game data is saved automatically. Enjoy!
